name: part_003
file: tmp_【Ayunda Risu 3D Birthday】The Rise of the NUT Warrior 【#TheNutWarrior】 [VYSAfYJ6FhI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Ayunda Risu performs the song 'Hoshi ga Furu' (Stars Fall) in a mystical forest setting.
A transition screen featuring a map showing Risu's progress to the next area.
Risu arrives in a dark dungeon and expresses her frustration before being addressed by a mysterious voice.

subtitles.original: 星が降る
subtitles.english: Stars Fall

subtitles.original:
Lyrics: 桃木香織 (マツモトカオリ)
Music, Arrangement: JunbugP
subtitles.english:
Lyrics: Kaori Momoki
Music, Arrangement: JunbugP

subtitles.original: 羽根もない この私が
subtitles.english: I, who have no wings,

subtitles.original: 憧れてた あの空
subtitles.english: gazed longingly at that sky.

subtitles.original: 背伸びして 星を掴む
subtitles.english: Stretching on tiptoe to grab the stars,

subtitles.original: 真似をしてみた
subtitles.english: I tried to imitate them.

subtitles.original: 負けないで 願いさえも
subtitles.english: "Don't give up," even as the darkness

subtitles.original: 飲み込む闇 それでも
subtitles.english: swallows even my wishes, nonetheless

subtitles.original: 手探りで 夢のカケラ
subtitles.english: fumbling for the fragments of my dreams,

subtitles.original: 集めに行こう
subtitles.english: I'll go to collect them.

subtitles.original: ただグルグル回る車輪の中で
subtitles.english: Just spinning 'round and 'round inside the wheel...

subtitles.original: 走っても走っても辿り着けなくて
subtitles.english: No matter how much I run, I can't reach my destination...

subtitles.original: 先を行く君の背中ばかりを見ていた
subtitles.english: I was only ever looking at your back as you forged ahead.

subtitles.original: いつか超えられる
subtitles.english: Someday, I'll be able to surpass you.

subtitles.original: もっと強くなりたい
subtitles.english: I want to become even stronger!

subtitles.original: たった独り 生まれてきた
subtitles.english: Having been born all alone,

subtitles.original: その記憶も無くして
subtitles.english: even that memory is lost.

subtitles.original: 泣き声も 届かないと
subtitles.english: Lamenting that my cries

subtitles.original: 嘆いてみても
subtitles.english: won't reach anyone...

subtitles.original: 信じていい 大きな木に
subtitles.english: I can believe in the claw marks

subtitles.original: しがみついた 爪痕
subtitles.english: left from clinging to the great tree.

subtitles.original: あの空へ 近付こうと
subtitles.english: As a testament that

subtitles.original: している証
subtitles.english: I'm trying to get closer to that sky!

subtitles.original: 風が雲を流して
subtitles.english: The wind sweeps the clouds away...

subtitles.original: 星が降る
subtitles.english: Stars fall.

subtitles.original: 羽根もない この私が
subtitles.english: I, who have no wings,

subtitles.original: 憧れてた あの空
subtitles.english: gazed longingly at that sky.

subtitles.original: 背伸びして 星を掴む
subtitles.english: Stretching on tiptoe to grab the stars,

subtitles.original: 真似をしてみた
subtitles.english: I tried to imitate them.

subtitles.original: 負けないで 願いさえも
subtitles.english: "Don't give up," even as the darkness

subtitles.original: 飲み込む闇 それでも
subtitles.english: swallows even my wishes, nonetheless

subtitles.original: 手探りで 夢のカケラ
subtitles.english: fumbling for the fragments of my dreams,

subtitles.original: 集めに行こう
subtitles.english: I'll go to collect them.

subtitles.original: Oh, I think after all this singing,
subtitles.english: Oh, I think after all this singing,

subtitles.original: my power is still not enough to defeat the giant pink monster.
subtitles.english: my power is still not enough to defeat the giant pink monster.

subtitles.original: I heard you, young warrior.
subtitles.english: I heard you, young warrior.

subtitles.original: I can help you with your worry.
subtitles.english: I can help you with your worry.
